NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
YARROW: Oeno! It is good to see you well, my friend. I apologize for sending Cycad in my place to find you - I would have loved to visit your <color=orange>mining site on Timber Hearth</color> again.
2
1
YARROW: Was Cycad able to inform you about the issue here I needed your help in investigating, before sending you my way?
3
2
OENO: An update: I have concluded the issue is not caused by any mechanical issue. I believe it to be caused by the sunless tide instead.
4
3
OENO: If you join me at the other tower with the same issue, I believe I will be able to better demonstrate my findings there!
5
2
OENO: He has, and the matter puzzled me enough to leave my work at the mines! I shall share my findings with you as soon as I can locate the problem.
6
5
YARROW: You have my deepest thanks, Oeno!
TH Tower EX2 2
TH Tower EX3 3
TH Tower EX3 4
